azureLogAnalytics.query:
SparkMetric_CL 
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated) 
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where name_s contains "executor.cpuTime" 
| project TimeGenerated , cpuTime=count_d/1000000 ,executor=strcat(nodeType_s,":",executorId_s),name_s
| summarize ExecutorCpuTime = max(cpuTime)- min(cpuTime) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m), executor
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last

SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter()
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where  name_s  contains "executor.BytesWritten"
| summarize ShuffleBytesWritten=max(count_d)- min(count_d)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), strcat("executor:",executorId_s) 
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last

SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter()
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where  name_s  contains "executor.BytesRead"
| summarize ShuffleBytesWritten=max(count_d)- min(count_d)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), strcat("executor:",executorId_s) 
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last

SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where nodeType_s == "executor"
| extend sname=split(name_s, ".")
| extend executor=strcat(sname[1]) 
| extend app=strcat(sname[0])
| summarize NumExecutors=dcount(executor)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m),app
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last

SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where name_s contains "DAGScheduler.job.activeJobs" 
| summarize NumJobs=sum(value_d) by bin(TimeGenerated,1m)
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last

SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where  name_s  contains "executor.memoryBytesSpilled"
| summarize ShuffleBytesWritten=max(count_d)- min(count_d)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), strcat("executor:",executorId_s) 
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last

SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where name_s contains "threadpool.activeTasks" 
| summarize sum(value_d)  by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last

SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where name_s contains "threadpool.activeTasks" 
| summarize sum(value_d)  by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m),strcat("executor:",executorId_s)
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last

SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter()
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where  name_s  contains "executor.diskBytesSpilled"
| summarize ShuffleBytesWritten=max(count_d)- min(count_d)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), strcat("executor:",executorId_s) 
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last

let results = SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where name_s contains "executor.jvmGCTime" 
| project TimeGenerated , jvmgcTime=count_d , executor=strcat("nodeType_s:",executorId_s) ,name_s
| join kind= inner (
SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where name_s contains "executor.RunTime"
| extend sname=split(name_s, ".")
| extend executor=strcat(sname[0],".",sname[1])
| project TimeGenerated , runTime=count_d , executor=strcat("nodeType_s:",executorId_s) ,name_s
) on executor, TimeGenerated;
results
| extend JvmcpuUsage=(jvmgcTime/runTime)*100
| summarize JvmCpuTime = percentile(JvmcpuUsage,90) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m), executor
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last
| render timechart

let results = SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where name_s contains "executor.jvmCpuTime" 
| project TimeGenerated , jvmCpuTime=value_d/1000000 , executor=strcat("nodeType_s:",executorId_s) ,name_s
| join kind= inner (
SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where name_s contains "executor.RunTime"
| project TimeGenerated , runTime=count_d , executor=strcat("nodeType_s:",executorId_s) ,name_s
) on executor, TimeGenerated;
results
| extend JvmcpuUsage=(jvmCpuTime/runTime)*100
| summarize JvmCpuTime = percentile(JvmcpuUsage,90) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m), executor
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last
| render timechart

let results = SparkMetric_CL 
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated) 
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where name_s contains "executor.cpuTime" 
| project TimeGenerated , cpuTime=count_d/1000000  ,  executor=strcat("nodeType_s:",executorId_s) ,name_s
| join kind= inner (
    SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated) 
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where name_s contains "executor.RunTime"
| project TimeGenerated , runTime=count_d  ,  executor=strcat("nodeType_s:",executorId_s) ,name_s
) on executor, TimeGenerated;
results
| extend cpuUsage=(cpuTime/runTime)*100
| summarize ExecutorCpuTime = percentile(cpuUsage,90) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m), executor
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last

SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter()
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where  name_s  contains "executor.shuffleBytesWritten"
| summarize ShuffleBytesWritten=max(count_d)- min(count_d)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), strcat("executor:",executorId_s) 
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last

SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter()
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where  name_s  contains "executor.shuffleTotalBytesRead"
| summarize ShuffleBytesWritten=max(count_d)- min(count_d)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), strcat("executor:",executorId_s) 
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last

SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where  name_s  contains "shuffle-client.usedDirectMemory"
//| where  name_s  contains "shuffle-client"
| summarize percentile(value_d,90)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m),  strcat("executor:",executorId_s)
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last

SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where  name_s  contains "shuffle-client.usedHeapMemory"
| summarize percentile(value_d,90)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m),  strcat("executor:",executorId_s)
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last

SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter()
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where  name_s  contains "executor.shuffleRemoteBytesRead"
| summarize ShuffleBytesWritten=max(count_d)- min(count_d)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), strcat("executor:",executorId_s) 
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last

SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter()
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where  name_s  contains "executor.shuffleFetchWaitTime"
| summarize ShuffleFetchWaitTimems=max(count_d)- min(count_d)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), strcat("executor:",executorId_s) 
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last

SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where name_s contains "BlockManager.memory" 
| extend sname=split(name_s, ".")
| extend  InstanceName=tostring(sname[4])
| summarize sum(value_d) by bin(TimeGenerated,1m), InstanceName
| render timechart
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last

let results = SparkMetric_CL 
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where name_s contains "executor.deserializetime" 
| project TimeGenerated , desetime=count_d , executor=strcat("nodeType_s:",executorId_s) ,name_s
| join kind= inner (
SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where name_s contains "executor.RunTime"
| project TimeGenerated , runTime=count_d , executor=strcat("nodeType_s:",executorId_s) ,name_s
) on executor, TimeGenerated;
results
| extend deseUsage=(desetime/runTime)*100
| summarize deSerializationCpuTime=percentiles(deseUsage,90) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m), executor
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last

panels.title: % Deserialize Time ( Ratio With Executor Runtime )

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let results = SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where name_s contains "executor.resultserializationtime" 
| project TimeGenerated , setime=count_d , executor=strcat("nodeType_s:",executorId_s) ,name_s
| join kind= inner (
SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where name_s contains "executor.RunTime"
| project TimeGenerated , runTime=count_d , executor=strcat("nodeType_s:",executorId_s) ,name_s
) on executor, TimeGenerated;
results
| extend serUsage=(setime/runTime)*100
| summarize SerializationCpuTime=percentile(serUsage,90) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m), executor
| order by TimeGenerated asc nulls last
| render timechart

panels.title: % Serialize Time ( Ratio With Executor Runtime )

azureLogAnalytics.query:
SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where name_s contains "DAGScheduler.stage" 
| extend sname=split(name_s, ".")
| extend  InstanceName=tostring(sname[4])
| summarize sum(value_d) by bin(TimeGenerated,1m), InstanceName
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last

SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where  name_s  contains "executor.filesystem.file.write_bytes" 
| summarize FileSystemWriteBytes=percentile(value_d,90)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), strcat("executor:",executorId_s)
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last

SparkMetric_CL
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where clusterName_s == '$clusterName'
| where  name_s  contains "executor.filesystem.file.read_bytes" 
| summarize FileSystemReadBytes=percentile(value_d,90)  by bin(TimeGenerated,  1m), strcat("executor:",executorId_s)
| order by TimeGenerated asc  nulls last 
| render timechart

list.definition: SparkMetric_CL | distinct clusterName_s | project clusterName= clusterName_s
list.label: Cluster Name
list.name: clusterName
list.query: SparkMetric_CL | distinct clusterName_s | project clusterName= clusterName_s
